item.title: LEVELS
item.description: webgl audio-reactive iterative function system Live Demo here play it some music with a beat and it should start dancing while being a TA at Gray Area I worked on a fractal installation that I wanted to be educational. Background I had been working with Raymarched Distance Fields for about a year and found a few cool techniques I was happy with: raymarching at half-res for performance
